amendment.description: An amendment to be in order, any rule of the House to the contrary nothwithstanding, to consider concurrent resolutions providing for the adjournment of the House and Senate during the month of July.

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 244 - 181 (Roll no. 580).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Matsui amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 198 (Roll no. 581).
